channel.title: Indirectly asking for conversion
channel.description:
There is one trend i noticed in all of the game i play. Sometimes, 2-3 investigative roles are killed. The king is out of reports. There hasn't been any new info since 2-3 days. And people just keep doing absolutly nothing every days. They won't execute anyone because "they need proof".
Then you finally say something "ok guys, lets stop waiting forever, clearly we're not getting reports and were slowly getting converted. Let's just execute among the unclears". Then everyone goes crazy and execute YOU.
Can we say that's indirectly just asking to be converted? Its like everyone's strategy is doing nothing and hope they get converted.
Anyone else noticed this trend?

item.title: Indirectly asking for conversion
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
